name: (Sinclair ZX81) Dungeons of Zedd
description:
Dungeons of Zedd

By Walter Ariel Risi, Naranjito Games, 2022

Dungeons of Zedd is a dungeon crawling game for the ZX 81 and compatible computers. Combining elements of roguelikes and classic action dungeon games, it provides a randomly generated dungeon which changes everytime to play.

Insite the thousands of chambers and tunnels of the Dungeons of Zedd, hide the 10 diabolic skull kings that have been spreading terror across your land.

Armed with a sword and a magic wand, you descend into the dark and deadly dungeons committed to finding and killing the skull kings that hide beneath it.

Inside the dungeons you will find different types of enemies. Fight them using magic spells or hand to hand, so as to hain the required experience to skill each skull king. You will not be able to kill the skull king until you have gained the required experience level, which may require to go back to combat!

You will also find rations of food, pieces of protective body armor and potions. Beware of potions, because some are healing and will restore your health, but others are potions and will damage your health.

Killing all enemies in a room or tunnel may uncover additional objects. But be careful, because it will also respawn all the enemies in the room!

With OPQAM, Cursor and ZXPand Joystick control modes, press fire and a  direction to cast a spell in that direction.

With AWSD/JIKL mode, you can move and cast spells in different directions at the same time.

Good luck!
